    • buy

      public void buy​(RetailShop shop, javax.swing.JLabel icon) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      When shop is free enters shop. Checks availability every 0.2s. Tries to buy n products.
      Parameters:
      shop - shop in which shopping is made
      icon - JLabel of client
      n - number of products to buy from range 1 to capacity of cart
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • consume

      public void consume()
      If clients buy too many products, consume them.
